description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Make as many words as you can from the letters of a six-letter word within the time limit. Practice alone or play on-line with up to 4 players for a place on the global scoreboards. Now with real-time High Scores.
description.short: Make as many words as you can from the letters of a six-letter word within the time limit. Practice alone or play on-line with up to 4 players for a place on the global scoreboards. Now with real-time High Scores.
